jobDescription: Job Purpose Statement When you’re looking for excellence, look no further than New Penn. Our commitment to our customers and employees shines through in everything we do. As one of our dock employees, you will be responsible for safely loading and unloading freight using a fork lift, pallet jack or other equipment to handle freight that varies in size and weight. Work days and hours vary. Essential Duties and Responsibilities:Load and unload freight utilizing fork lift, pallet jack or material handling equipmentBalance and roll drums on barrel truckUse fork lifts, hand trucks, and pallet jacks etc.Secure cargo using chains, load bars, wood blocks, straps etc.Complete inspection reports, bills of loading, manifests, and accident reportsVerify loads are correct, and note any overages, shortages or damagesComply with all regulations for safety and efficiencyKeep dock and equipment clean at all timesRequired Education and Experience:Ability to lift up to 50 lbs repetitivelyAccurately perform mathematical calculationsAbility to work various days and hoursWork in all-weather conditionsPass company-administered drug testOperate essential material handling equipment to perform tasks
